Sentencas: Many new materials have been identified as being of potential interest to solid oxide fuel cell developers.
Titulo: Novel K2NiF4-Type Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Compatibility with Electrolytes in the Intermediate Temperature Range

Sentencas: Recent work has suggested that materials of the La2NiO4 composition possess sufficient activity to act as an effective cathode.
Titulo: Novel K2NiF4-Type Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Compatibility with Electrolytes in the Intermediate Temperature Range

Sentencas: Whilst there have been many studies of the transport properties of materials of this family the reactivity with electrolyte compositions has received relatively little attention.
Titulo: Novel K2NiF4-Type Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Compatibility with Electrolytes in the Intermediate Temperature Range

Sentencas: In this work we have investigated the compatibility of La2NiO4 + d (LNO) with LSGM and ceria gadolinium oxide (CGO) electrolytes.
Titulo: Novel K2NiF4-Type Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Compatibility with Electrolytes in the Intermediate Temperature Range

Sentencas: It is clear that under an air atmosphere LNO reacts readily with CGO electrodes with the formation of a higher order Ruddlesden-Popper (La-n + 1NinO3n + 1) phase as one of the reaction products.
Titulo: Novel K2NiF4-Type Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Compatibility with Electrolytes in the Intermediate Temperature Range

Sentencas: In contrast, there is no evidence of secondary phase formation with LSGM electrolytes from the obtained diffraction data over a period of 72 h at temperatures up to 1,273 K.
Titulo: Novel K2NiF4-Type Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Compatibility with Electrolytes in the Intermediate Temperature Range
